title: Kimono, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic yarns
Technique: stencil-printed, painted and embroidered
description: Kimono of black silk crepe with elaborate decoration across shoulers, down the hanging sleeves, and around the bottom. Stencilled and painted flowers, fruit, and two angry dragons. Details of design in couched adn embroidered gold thread. Lined with bright red silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Kimono, early 20th century.Medium: silk, metallic yarns
Technique: stencil-printed, painted and embroidered. 1951-112-10-c.
